name: Mail Mole - Talpa Games
description:
Join Molty in his deliveries around the world!
  • Visit Grassy Hills, Sandy Valley and Melting Mountains.
  • Meet Rick at Peaceful Plaza.
  • Discover great places and get the best times on each level!

Talpa Games is a small indie game studio focused on creating great experiences for all the family. 

If you want to know more about #MailMole continue reading and follow us on twitter @TalpaGames.

Website: talpagames.com

Twitter: @TalpaGames
